<strong style="display: block;">Which expression correctly describes the cost of equity under Modigliani–Miller Proposition II (without taxes)?</strong>

<label><input type="radio" name="module7_mcq_q3" value="A"> A. $r_E = r_D + (r_U - r_D)\frac{E}{D}$</label><br>

<label><input type="radio" name="module7_mcq_q3" value="D"> D. $r_E = r_U + \frac{D}{E} \times (r_U - r_D)$</label><br>
